properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.autowired-enabled
properties.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.bridge-error-handler
properties.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.configuration
properties.description: To use the shared configuration. The option is a org.apache.camel.component.olingo4.Olingo4Configuration type.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.connect-timeout
properties.description: HTTP connection creation timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.content-type
properties.description: Content-Type header value can be used to specify JSON or XML message format, defaults to application/json;charset=utf-8

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.enabled
properties.description: Whether to enable auto configuration of the olingo4 component. This is enabled by default.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.filter-already-seen
properties.description: Set this to true to filter out results that have already been communicated by this component.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.http-async-client-builder
properties.description: Custom HTTP async client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely. The option is a org.apache.http.impl.nio.client.HttpAsyncClientBuilder type.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.http-client-builder
properties.description: Custom HTTP client builder for more complex HTTP client configuration, overrides connectionTimeout, socketTimeout, proxy and sslContext. Note that a socketTimeout MUST be specified in the builder, otherwise OData requests could block indefinitely. The option is a org.apache.http.impl.client.HttpClientBuilder type.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.http-headers
properties.description: Custom HTTP headers to inject into every request, this could include OAuth tokens, etc.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.lazy-start-producer
properties.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.proxy
properties.description: HTTP proxy server configuration. The option is a org.apache.http.HttpHost type.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.service-uri
properties.description: Target OData service base URI, e.g. http://services.odata.org/OData/OData.svc

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.socket-timeout
properties.description: HTTP request timeout in milliseconds, defaults to 30,000 (30 seconds)

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.split-result
properties.description: For endpoints that return an array or collection, a consumer endpoint will map every element to distinct messages, unless splitResult is set to false.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: To configure security using SSLContextParameters. The option is a org.apache.camel.support.jsse.SSLContextParameters type.

properties.name: camel.component.olingo4.use-global-ssl-context-parameters
properties.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.
